languages.text: "Он тянет время. Если не действовать жестко, он продолжит болтать".
"He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."
languages.original_text: "Он тянет время. Если не действовать жестко, он продолжит болтать".

traits.locale_text: "He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."
"He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."
"He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."
"He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."
"He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."
"He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."

languages.text: «Está perdiendo tiempo. No dejará de parlotear a menos que tomemos medidas severas».
languages.original_text: "He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."

traits.locale_text: «Está perdiendo tiempo. No dejará de parlotear a menos que tomemos medidas severas».

languages.text: “他这是在耽误时间。我们必须给他点厉害，否则他会没完没了地唠叨下去。”
languages.original_text: "He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."

traits.locale_text: “他这是在耽误时间。我们必须给他点厉害，否则他会没完没了地唠叨下去。”

languages.text: 「彼は時間稼ぎをしています。厳しい措置を取らない限り、おしゃべりし続けるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は時間稼ぎをしています。厳しい措置を取らない限り、おしゃべりし続けるでしょう」

languages.text: « Il essaie de gagner du temps. Et il continuera à jacasser comme une pie à moins que nous employions la manière forte. »
languages.original_text: "He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."

traits.locale_text: « Il essaie de gagner du temps. Et il continuera à jacasser comme une pie à moins que nous employions la manière forte. »

languages.text: "Zaman kazanmaya çalışıyor. Sertlik görmedikçe buna devam edecektir."
languages.original_text: "He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."

traits.locale_text: "Zaman kazanmaya çalışıyor. Sertlik görmedikçe buna devam edecektir."

languages.text: "Er mauert. Wenn wir keine harte Maßnahmen ergreifen, plappert er einfach weiter."
languages.original_text: "He is stalling. He will continue to chatter away unless harsh action is taken."

traits.locale_text: "Er mauert. Wenn wir keine harte Maßnahmen ergreifen, plappert er einfach weiter."
